pkg:npm/example-package@1.2.3.description: Security patch for CVE-2025-1234 that fixes critical vulnerability in authentication handling

GHSA-1234-5678-9012.description:
### Impact

A critical vulnerability in example-package versions < 1.2.3 allows an attacker to bypass authentication by sending specially crafted requests.

### Patches

Users should upgrade to version 1.2.3 or apply this patch.

### Workarounds

Implement additional authentication validation at the application level.
GHSA-1234-5678-9012.patchExplanation: This patch adds proper input validation and sanitization to the authentication handler, ensuring all requests are properly authenticated before being processed.

GHSA-3456-7890-1234.summary: Denial of service through resource exhaustion
GHSA-3456-7890-1234.description: An attacker can cause a denial of service by sending requests that consume excessive memory.
GHSA-3456-7890-1234.patchExplanation: Added resource limits and request throttling to prevent memory exhaustion attacks.
